languages.text: "Леди Теодора с уважением относилась к деяниям культа, хоть и никогда не снисходила до того, чтобы даровать им аудиенции или приближать к себе кого-то из ткачей".
"Although Lady Theodora never granted the cult an audience or brought a spinner into her retinue, she respected the Bloodspun Web and approved of its mission."
languages.original_text: "Леди Теодора с уважением относилась к деяниям культа, хоть и никогда не снисходила до того, чтобы даровать им аудиенции или приближать к себе кого-то из ткачей".

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora had respect for the cult and its works, albeit without ever deigning to grant them an audience or bring a weaver into her retinue."
"Lady Theodora had respect for the cult and its works, albeit without ever deigning to grant them an audience or bring a weaver into her retinue."
"Although Lady Theodora never granted the cult an audience or brought a weaver into her retinue, she respected the Bloodspun Web and approved of its mission."
"Although Lady Theodora never granted the cult an audience or brought a weaver into her retinue, she respected the Bloodspun Web and approved of its mission."
"Although Lady Theodora never granted the cult an audience or brought a spinner into her retinue, she respected the Bloodspun Web and approved of its mission."
"Although Lady Theodora never granted the cult an audience or brought a spinner into her retinue, she respected the Bloodspun Web and approved of its mission."

languages.text: « Bien que dame Théodora n'ait jamais accordé d'audience au culte ni accepté de tisseur dans son entourage, elle respectait la Toile de Sang et approuvait sa mission. »
languages.original_text: "Although Lady Theodora never granted the cult an audience or brought a spinner into her retinue, she respected the Bloodspun Web and approved of its mission."

traits.locale_text: « Bien que dame Théodora n'ait jamais accordé d'audience au culte ni accepté de tisseur dans son entourage, elle respectait la Toile de Sang et approuvait sa mission. »

languages.text: «Aunque lady Theodora nunca otorgó una audiencia al culto ni aceptó a un tejedor en su séquito, respetaba a la Red Sanguinolenta y veía su misión con buenos ojos».
languages.original_text: "Although Lady Theodora never granted the cult an audience or brought a spinner into her retinue, she respected the Bloodspun Web and approved of its mission."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque lady Theodora nunca otorgó una audiencia al culto ni aceptó a un tejedor en su séquito, respetaba a la Red Sanguinolenta y veía su misión con buenos ojos».

languages.text: “尽管西奥多拉夫人从来都没接触过这个教派，也没有吸纳织网者到她的随行人员之中，但她很尊重织血罗网，也认可他们的使命。”
languages.original_text: "Although Lady Theodora never granted the cult an audience or brought a spinner into her retinue, she respected the Bloodspun Web and approved of its mission."

traits.locale_text: “尽管西奥多拉夫人从来都没接触过这个教派，也没有吸纳织网者到她的随行人员之中，但她很尊重织血罗网，也认可他们的使命。”

languages.text: 「シオドーラ様は魔女団に謁見することも、紡績工を従者に迎えることもなかったが、ブラッドスパン・ウェブを尊敬し、その使命を認めていました」
languages.original_text: "Although Lady Theodora never granted the cult an audience or brought a spinner into her retinue, she respected the Bloodspun Web and approved of its mission."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラ様は魔女団に謁見することも、織工を従者に迎えることもなかったが、ブラッドスパン・ウェブを尊敬し、その使命を認めていました」

languages.text: "Obwohl Lady Theodora dem Kult nie eine Audienz gewährt oder einen Spinner in ihr Gefolge aufgenommen hat, hat sie das Blutgesponnene Netz respektiert und seine Mission gebilligt."
languages.original_text: "Although Lady Theodora never granted the cult an audience or brought a spinner into her retinue, she respected the Bloodspun Web and approved of its mission."

traits.locale_text: "Obwohl Lady Theodora dem Kult nie eine Audienz gewährt oder einen Spinner in ihr Gefolge aufgenommen hat, hat sie das Blutgesponnene Netz respektiert und seine Mission gebilligt."

languages.text: "Her ne kadar Leydi Theodora, tarikatı hiçbir zaman huzuruna kabul etmemiş ya da maiyetine bir dokur katmamış olsa da Kanipi Ağı'na hürmet gösterir ve misyonunu onaylardı."
languages.original_text: "Although Lady Theodora never granted the cult an audience or brought a spinner into her retinue, she respected the Bloodspun Web and approved of its mission."
